trans-unit.target: TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SEQ_00<tab>Godbert is ready to lead you to Vanhudi's waiting pilot.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SEQ_01<tab>Hildibrand and the others listen patiently as Godbert explains where they are to board Vanhudi's private airship. The pilot should be awaiting the Mandervilles' arrival atop the rise just south of Kadjaya's Footsteps.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SEQ_02<tab>The pilot ferries you directly to Vanhudi's abode, where the affluent merchant welcomes you with open arms. Vanhudi remains unrepentant in the face of Hildibrand's scornful accusations, even going so far as to invite you to join his wildly ambitious scheme to conquer the entire world. Disappointed yet unsurprised by your refusal, he puts into motion a contingency plan prepared far in advance. It transpires that hidden caches of crystals and the faith of his cloned selves shall provide the aetherial fuel for a summoning ritual then and there, for anyone who stands against him is an obstacle to be removed─in your case, a task he entrusts to the sixfold blades of divine Asura.
※The Gilded Araya can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SEQ_03<tab>You cross swords with the primal Asura, a mockery of the Manusya deity of battle, and emerge triumphant. The time has come for Vanhudi to face the consequences of his unbridled greed.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return by speaking with PuPu on the Perfumed Rise.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SEQ_04<tab>After witnessing the fall of his primal champion, Vanhudi attempts to flee, only to be foiled when his airship is shot down by a familiar-looking alien starship. This vessel belongs to PuPu's missing friend, who had been deceived by the avaricious merchant─and as a result determined that the people of Etheirys cannot be trusted. The alien thus declares his intention to subjugate the world, beginning with Hildibrand and company.
PuPu uses his own starship to fend off the rampaging extraterrestrial, and the counterattack unintentionally breaches his opponent's reactor core. Realizing that the craft is primed for a violent explosion, Brandihild manipulates the ship's external controls to fly it high into the air before it detonates in spectacular fashion. In light of Brandihild's heroics, PuPu's comrade has a change of heart, becoming convinced that peaceful coexistence on Etheirys is possible after all.
Hildibrand assures everyone that his hardy clone will be just fine, then turns his attention to PuPu's damaged starship...which promptly malfunctions, abducts the frantic inspector, then takes off into the distance at a ludicrous rate of speed. Unperturbed by this typical turn of events and content to leave Vanhudi to the mercy of the Radiant Host, Godbert suggests a return to Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SEQ_05<tab>Having received the answers to his weaponsmithing questions, Godbert bids you rejoin his High Crucible endeavor at your earliest convenience. Meanwhile, the aliens who provided said answers offer their own farewells as they set off to explore the wide world they now call home. Last but not least, Delion thanks you for helping him find the truth behind his outlandish conspiracies, before immediately rushing off in search of some new mystery to misinterpret. One only wonders what became of the inspectors after fate propelled them along their separate celestial trajectories...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the private airship pilot.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TODO_01<tab>Confront Asura on the Gilded Araya.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TODO_02<tab>Confront Asura on the Gilded Araya.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Delion.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_100_000<tab>Let us take this Vanhudi to task, and bring an end to this case once and for all!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_NASHUMHAKARACCA_100_001<tab>That was a smashing hit, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_100_002<tab>All this talk of threats and deceit has me worried...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_100_003<tab>The inspector's mother is as monstrously strong as the Manderville men. Except...that doesn't make any sense...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_BRADIHILND_100_004<tab>I am given to understand that, while identical in appearance, the craft belonging to Master PuPu's comrade is equipped with more advanced technology.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_JULYAN_100_005<tab>Good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. And good to see yer still keepin' company with our darlin' boy!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_JULYAN_100_006<tab>That blocky lad a new friend of yers? Smooth off the edges and he'd be the spittin' image of our Hildy.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_000<tab>Shall we be on our way? We're to meet Vanhudi's pilot atop the rise just south of Kadjaya's Footsteps.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SERVANT04800_000_010<tab>Lord Godbert, Lady Julyan...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SERVANT04800_000_011<tab>And...entourage?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_012<tab>Pray excuse our presumptuousness. My son and his companions insisted they come along, desperate as they were to meet with the illustrious Master Vanhudi.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SERVANT04800_000_013<tab>I see... One moment, if you please.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SERVANT04800_000_014<tab>Lord Vanhudi should be glad to welcome you all to his home. Pray step aboard and I shall take you there directly.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_300<tab>Welcome, honored guests, to my humble abode! I trust the view is to your liking? Since you traveled all the way from distant Ul'dah, a pleasant backdrop to our talks was the least I could provide.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_301<tab>And what an unexpected boon <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> is. I had been debating when to extend you a personal invitation...but now here you are, like a wish come true!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_302<tab>Save your act for the magistrates, Vanhudi! We know the secret of your ill-gotten gold!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_303<tab>You will cease this exploitation of alien technology and release your hostage into the care of Master PuPu at once!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_304<tab>Unraveled all my schemes, have you? Good. I needn't waste my breath on tedious explanations, then.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_305<tab>This is “Master PuPu,” I presume? I do have his fellow alien here with me, yes.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_306<tab>As for exploiting their technology, I freely admit to duplicating a quite frankly obscene amount of gold. But that was merely the beginning.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_307<tab>Imagine making copy after copy of the deadliest weapons in existence... Would not the world itself be yours for the taking?

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_308<tab>Let's get straight to the point: I want you at my side. With the vaunted Warrior of Light as the template for my clone army, we could conquer this and every other land in creation!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_A1_000_001<tab>I refuse! Categorically and emphatically!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_A1_000_002<tab>That...that's not a bad idea, actually.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_309<tab>Ah...ha ha ha! A splendid jest, my friend.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_100_309<tab>A splendid and...not-at-all-indicative-of-suppressed-megalomaniacal-ambitions jest...yes?

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_310<tab>Of course it was! Our redoubtable <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> would never <var 1A 02 /var>dream<var 1A 01 /var> of accepting such a contemptible proposal!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_311<tab>A pity. Yet I anticipated you would prove an impediment to my ascension.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_312<tab>Yes, it seems the time has come to test Lugae's ritual of manifestation.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_313<tab>All was prepared long in advance of your coming. This tower holds not only mundane treasures, but also caches of crystals.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_314<tab>As for the requisite congregation of worshipers, well...I had but to clone myself. After all, who is more devoted to my cause─and my goddess─than me?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_315<tab>Divine Asura! Take up Thy blades and wage war upon mine earthly rival!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_316<tab>Nay, Hildibrand. Against a primal, we may be more hindrance than help! We dare not remain within its sphere of influence!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_317<tab>Best of luck, my friend! I must make a gentlemanly withdrawal!

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_320<tab>Were you also forced to make a “gentlemanly withdrawal”? Should you need a means to return to Vanhudi's treasure tower, my starship and I are at your disposal.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_Q2_000_000<tab>Travel to the Gilded Araya?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_400<tab>Good show, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! 'Twould seem you thoroughly trounced that pesky primal!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_401<tab>And even as we speak, Mother and Father should be informing the Radiant Host of that despicable Vanhudi's wrongdoings.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_402<tab>The divine Asura, defeated...? Turn the wheel! We flee for now!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_MYSTERIOUSMAN_000_403<tab>Who is flying the starship without my permission!? That treasure is mine and mine alone!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_404<tab>You called your vessel, Master PuPu?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_405<tab>No, I did not. It's my friend's ship!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_406<tab>At last! The moment of sweet reunion is at hand!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_407<tab>I am so relieved to see you safe.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_408<tab>Likewise, my friend.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_409<tab>But why did you open fire on the airship? Didn't that man help you after your crash?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_410<tab>He did...at first. He pulled me from the wreckage and saw to it that my vessel was repaired.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_411<tab>So, in return, I replicated whatever trinket he desired, and taught him the basics of starship technology. But that resolved to be a terrible error in judgment.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_412<tab>When I was infected by one of this star's unique pathogens, he took advantage of my weakened state. He seized my ship, flew me out to the jungle, and there left me to die.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_413<tab>Slowly, agonizingly, I was able to synthesize a cure for my affliction. And then I came back to reclaim my property.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_414<tab>This experience has led me to conclude that the dominant sentient life-forms here are dull-witted, cruel, and entirely unsuited to peaceful cohabitation...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_415<tab>We must launch a full-scale invasion! It is the only way to guarantee our survival!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_416<tab>No, no─they are not all like that! These ones have been nothing but kind to me!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_417<tab>Oh, yes, they're all smiles until they laser you in the back! We have to strike first before they show their true colors!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_418<tab>The ship's reactor core has been breached! If it explodes, everyone in the vicinity will be atomized...and we're all in the vicinity!

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_BRADIHILND_000_419<tab>Think, damn it, think! If I'm to stop the explosion, I need to traverse the considerable distance to the starship. But I can conceive of no logical solution!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_200_419<tab>Inspector Brandihild! You must employ my father's mighty moves to propel me to the vessel!

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_BRADIHILND_200_420<tab>I too have calculated that Lord Godbert's signature techniques are our only means of achieving sufficient propulsion. Yet there is a flaw in your proposal: I lack the strength to properly perform the throw, and I've no time to teach you the starship's controls.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_100_421<tab>Inspector Hildibrand, it is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who must fling <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_100_419<tab>Skyward, as only a Manderville can!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_300_420<tab>I, uh...I lost my grip.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_200_421<tab>Given my trajectory and velocity, the correct shift in posture should generate enough lift and precessional motion to─ Yes, I can still make it!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_BRADIHILND_100_420<tab>'Tis too late─the reactor is going critical! There's only one way to save the day...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_420<tab>Inspector Brandihild!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_BRADIHILND_100_422<tab>Our brief time together was more than any defective clone could ask for. Be well, my friends...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_421<tab>Is this...case closed for Inspector Brandihild!?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_422<tab>Nay, my loyal assistant. As a chip off the old gentleman, our dear Brandihild has surely survived to tell the tale.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_100_422<tab>We shall see him again, mark my words!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_423<tab>You rescued me. Even though I tried to incinerate you with high-intensity plasma blasts.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_424<tab>Even at the cost of one of your own. If only I could make amends and earn your forgiveness, but alas...

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_425<tab>There is naught to forgive─with his blocky constitution, Inspector Brandihild will be just fine, I assure you. As a friend of Master PuPu, you are a friend of ours, and what are a few minor plasma burns among friends, eh!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_426<tab>Our home planet... It was lost to the phenomenon you call the “Final Days.” We survived only because we were away exploring the cosmos at the time.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_427<tab>Our explorations, which had heretofore served no purpose but curiosity, shifted to a search for safe haven. We visited countless stars, but all had succumbed to the same insidious ruin as our own.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_428<tab>Growing desperate, we decided to settle on any suitable refuge we could find─whether it was populated or not. If the native beings were hospitable, we would live peacefully alongside them; if not, then we were prepared to claim a new home by force.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_429<tab>So it was that I arrived at your miraculous planet. Lulled by the apparent absence of metaphysical chaos, I blundered into a mundane war zone, where I was promptly shot out of the sky.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_430<tab>The rest you already know. Having fallen behind during our search, I hurried here when my communications received no answer. That was when I met you, Inspector Hildibrand.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_100_430<tab>Those touched by the despair of the Final Days are reduced to beasts. Given our savage willingness to invade your star, it would seem that, in a sense, we fell prey to that despair after all.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_100_431<tab>Fortunately, my encounter with you generous people brought me to my senses─an outcome for which I am profoundly grateful.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_431<tab>That said, there is nowhere else for us to go. Would...would it be too much to ask for us to live here, on your star?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_432<tab>Well, of course you must stay!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_433<tab>And I suspect you'll be wishing to repair your damaged vessel...
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_000_434<tab>Mummyyyyyy!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_435<tab>Oh, Inspector, not again! Wait for meeeeee!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_436<tab>Ohohoho, never a dull moment around our Hildibrand!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_437<tab>At least we needn't worry if the ship crashes. Not with an impervious Mandervillian on board.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_438<tab>Ah, funny you should mention that... Upon reviewing the Manderville family tree, 'twas made clear that a lord without heirs of his own passed the name to an adopted child several generations ago.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_439<tab>...Are you saying that you and your son are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> direct descendants of Godbrand, the alien progenitor of the Manderville line? Then how do you explain your unnatural sturdiness!?

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_440<tab>When it comes to building strength and perfecting gentlemanly technique, 'tis not one's lineage which matters, but rather the unbending conviction within one's heart. Though Godbrand's bloodline be broken, House Manderville shall live on through us!

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_JULYAN_000_441<tab>If the begoggled boy can't swallow that explanation, I've also heard talk of some unseen power driven by feelings and emotions. Could be that you and Hildy've tapped into that cosmic essence.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_442<tab>Ohohoho! If that's the case, then you must be positively swimming in it, my dear!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_443<tab>Ahem, every...uh...thing appears to be under control here, so let us return to the city, shall we?

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_HILDIBRAND_100_444<tab>Ah, once more do I find myself hurtling at superlative speed towards an unknown destination. Another day, another thrilling case for Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_450<tab>Thanks to an enlightening conversation with Master PuPu on the way back, I believe I have the answers required to proceed with our weaponsmithing project.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_451<tab>You needn't neglect your other commitments, of course, but I would welcome your continued cooperation.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_452<tab>I trust the endeavor yet holds your interest? Pray inform Master Gerolt of your willingness to assist, and my hammer and I shall make all haste to the High Crucible.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_GODBERT_000_453<tab>And with that, I bid you good day!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_JULYAN_000_454<tab>Thank ye all for lookin' out for our beloved son! I'm sure him and the blocky lad'll be back for more cases afore ye know it!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_455<tab>You've gone above and beyond for us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, so I'd like you to have the one replicated starship we made.

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_456<tab>It doesn't have the duplication facility or other such technology on board, but it will carry you through the skies! Use this key to call it whenever you wish.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_TOMODACHI_000_457<tab>As for the two of us, we've decided to get to know our new home better by embarking on a journey of exploration.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_458<tab>And so this is where we must say our farewells.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_KOYOKOYO_000_459<tab>Thank you for everything─we are fortunate indeed to have met you!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_460<tab>It seems PuPu wasn't planning an invasion after all. He even tried to stop his friend from launching an attack...

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_461<tab>I'm calling an end to this investigation, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your unfailing support during this entire ordeal has been most appreciated.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_462<tab>Thanks to you, I was able to observe the inner workings of Sharlayan, and even traveled to the surface of the moon in search of the truth.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_463<tab>And when my own conspiracies threatened to blind me, you were there to open my eyes to the true shape of things.
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_464<tab>But this world yet harbors its share of the strange and the inexplicable─not the least of which is the source of Hildibrand's impossible physiology!

TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_000_465<tab>If not an alien, then...ah! Mayhap he's the product of a hyper-advanced civilization from the distant past!? The descendant of some gruesome biological experiment!?
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_DELION_100_466<tab>Someone needs to plumb the depths of these unexplained phenomena, and I am the very man for the job!
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>Alien blood never flowed in their veins♪
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>Their source of strength an enigma remains♪
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>A dynamic folk♪ Their clothing bespoke♪ A gentlemanly family─the good House Manderville♪
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_503<tab>A true inspector is born from the heart♪
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_510<tab>La-la-li-lah-la, la-da-di-di-dah♪
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_511<tab>La-la-li-lah-la, la-da-di-di-dah♪
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_512<tab>Tra-ra-la-la-lah♪ Tra-la-da-di-dah♪ Tra-ra-la-di-dah-dah-dah Tra-ra-la-la-la-la-la♪
TEXT_CHRHDB852_04800_SYSTEM_000_513<tab>Cha-lah li-dah la-li-da-li-da-dah♪
